info.author: Openstack Community
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
This project is to provide functionality for network
connectivity health check. First we need to describe a network
connectivity graph (e.g. some nodes can send data to others via
tagged VLAN). We then can use this graph to check if network
equipment is configured accoring to the graph (i.e. we can
send probe data from one node and then to try to catch these
data on the other one).
info.name: Network-checker
info.html_description: This project is to provide functionality for network connectivity health check. First we need to describe a network connectivity graph (e.g. some nodes can send data to others via tagged VLAN). We then can use this graph to check if network equipment is configured accoring to the graph (i.e. we can send probe data from one node and then to try to catch these data on the other one).
